Description: Required Skills to be successful:•   Extensive knowledge of inventory management systems & Supply chain modules in other ERP systems like SAP•   Demonstrated experience developing management reporting packs and presenting to senior leadership.•   Skilled in problem solving and continuous improvement methodologies•   Understanding of agile way of working About the Team:You will be reporting to the Operations Manager and will be working in a fast-paced Automotive supply chain division in Dubai Investment Park (DIP). What equips you for the role:Around 5 years of experience in the field of Supply Chain, preferably with Automotive experience or FMCG or Retail industry.Extensive knowledge of Inventory management systems.
